alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 16 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of Arkansas and Oklahoma, including the following counties, in Arkansas, Benton, Carroll, Crawford, Franklin, Madison, Sebastian and Washington AR. In Oklahoma, Adair, Cherokee, Haskell, Latimer, Le Flore, McIntosh, Muskogee, Pittsburg and Sequoyah. * WHEN...From Friday morning through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A frontal boundary will stall over the region during the day Friday. Strong lift along with record precipitable water values and training of storms possible will lead to a zone of heavy rainfall during the day Friday through Friday night across the watch area. Widespread 1-2 inches with localized amounts over 4 inches are possible across the region. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington
